CustomField.description: Provide a comma-separated list of flow contexts (INSERT, UPDATE, UPSERT, DELETE, REFRESH) that flow-powered rollups should run in (skips any rollups called where the flow context does not match an entry in this list)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide a comma-separated list of flow contexts (INSERT, UPDATE, UPSERT, DELETE, REFRESH) that flow-powered rollups should run in (skips any rollups called where the flow context does not match an entry in this list)
CustomField.label: Flow - Only Run In These Contexts
